name: Commander Escape
description:
Commander’s Escape is a platform, lite puzzle game where you have to move blocks to progress through the level. The goal is to reach the end in the quickest possible time. This is our first submission to a game jam. We really enjoyed the exercise and learned a lot.. 

Controls:

A/D - Move left / right

Space - Jump

Q/E - Next / Previous color mode

Enter(hold) - Activate device

---

Credits:

Music and Sound Effects: Dustin Rosata

Scripting: Mike Rosata

Level Design: Sean Casey
